name: Time To Decide - GD.tv GameJam 2022
description:
My first game jam game, made for the GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022!

This is a  game that makes decisions for you, like flipping a coin (or 5), or using one of those magic 8 ball toys.

The object is to ask the game a question, and give it 5 possible answers. The game will choose one of those answers at random.

The game is visually themed for Halloween, inspired by the game jam theme, "Death is only the beginning!", where in the case of this game, the death is the un-chosen answers, and the new beginning is the chosen answer.

You can really make this game serve any theme, just by being creative with your questions and answers!

I will also upload a text-only version of the game, just in case people might want to play it without a theme.

The game is available for Windows, MacOSX, Linux, Android, and HTML5, along with the source!

Thank you for checking out the game!

[UPDATE 1]

Due to an unknown bug causing the themed version to crash, I was unable to submit the themed version. However, I will submit the themed version as soon as I work out the show stopping bug.

[END OF UPDATE 1]

[UPDATE 2]

I have started the re-build process of the themed version, so I hope you all will check it out as soon as it's finished! In the meantime, I have also added an  in-browser playable version of the  text-only version of the game, so you all can at least play that until the main game is re-built!

Thanks!

[END OF UPDATE 2]
